LanguageData.ARA_Huge_Weapon_Category.label: Huge Weapon Organ
LanguageData.ARA_Huge_Weapon_Category.description: This weapon organ is quite large and can only be used by large Arachnae Swarm Nodes (body size greater than 2.0).
LanguageData.ARA_Weapon_Damage_Category.label: Special Weapon Organ
LanguageData.ARA_Weapon_Damage_Category.description: This weapon organ can cause other effects in addition to standard damage.
